title: CAVERN Toolkit
intro: A Unity SDK for 270° immersive projection environments. Built to make the weird spatial stuff easier to build on top of.

title: EchoCAVERN
intro: Personal R&D — an AI-driven voice-to-3D experience built for immersive projection space. Still evolving.

title: Burrata Virtual Production
intro: Pipeline setup and sample project for the first virtual production studio at CMU ETC.

title: Monster's Memoir
intro: Immersive animation screened on a 270° projection wall.

title: Nightingale
intro: Concert visuals for No Doubt.

title: Zach Become Human
intro: A game about Mark Zuckerberg trying to be a person. Almost showed it to him. So close.

title: Toledo Park Quest
intro: Educational game built for local youth in partnership with the City of Toledo.

title: Volunteer Peeping Contract
intro: An installation that pokes at privacy, surveillance, and what we agree to without reading.

title: House Generator
intro: Procedural architecture generation — Houdini and Unreal PCG pipeline.

title: URP Painterly Shader
intro: A stylized painterly shader built in Unity URP.

title: Flesh & Motion
intro: Personal R&D in Houdini — procedural animation and FX with a distinctly gory, visceral aesthetic. Organs. Fluids. The good stuff.

title: AI DCC Bridge
intro: A growing collection of tools built while experimenting with AI inside DCC pipelines.

title: Scotty 3D
intro: CMU Computer Graphics course final. Here to prove I know what a vertex is.

title: Codesmith / Federal
intro: Brand identity and landing page for a $100M+ federal education initiative.

title: MIA au Chocolat
intro: 3D web experience for my fictional virtual bakery. Delicious and unnecessary.

title: Jessy Vodka
intro: A website for a vodka brand that doesn't exist. Stupid and great.

title: Clementine
intro: My personal AI assistant. She lives here now.

title: The Dive
intro: Animation. A girl becomes an axolotl. It makes sense when you watch it.

title: Santa Beer
intro: A beer advertisement made entirely with AI-generated content. Festive and slightly unhinged.

title: By the Ruins
intro: Documentary about outsider artists in 00s Beijing.

title: All That Is Solid Melts Into Air
intro: A sarcastic video response to Chinese government lockdown regulations. Named after Marx. Obviously.

title: My Life Is A Pathetic Mumblecore Film
intro: Self-portrait video. The title says everything.

title: J of Theseus
intro: A humanoid searches for the perfect organs to become real. Currently looking for a heart.

title: Silent Night
intro: Stop-motion animation about a quiet moment in WWI, recreated with chess pieces.

title: Monday Morning
intro: Collage animation. Exactly what it sounds like.

title: Twin Peaks Intro
intro: Tarot card animation reimagining the Twin Peaks intro sequence.
